mapper.select: select current_status_id as id,count(1) as count from resume where deleted=0 group by current_status_id
select sex,level_id as levelId,count(1) as value from resume where sex is not null and level_id is not null and deleted=0 group by sex,level_id

select DATE_FORMAT(birthday,'%Y') AS birthYear,level_id as levelId,count(1) as value from resume where birthday is not null and level_id is not null and deleted=0 group by level_id,DATE_FORMAT(birthday,'%Y')
select area_id as id,count(1) as value from resume where level_id=#{levelId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted=0 and area_id is not null group by area_id
